sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix"> <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <before>false</before> <description>Monthly Predictions Count - Copy data for past months from ua_event_stat to usageanalytics_count</description> <name>Copy past monthly prediction counts</name> <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback> <script><![CDATA[gs.info("Monthly Predictions Count - Copying data for past months from ua_event_stat to usageanalytics_count"); SNC.MLFixScriptUtil.copyPastUADataFromEventStatToCount(); ]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2018-03-12 17:52:49</sys_created_on> <sys_id>79ec18f1eb3013004afb5722aaa34576</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Copy past monthly prediction counts</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="Predictive Intelligence" source="com.glide.platform_ml">c41430683c31311068bcf327dfe37f28</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_79ec18f1eb3013004afb5722aaa34576</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2018-03-12 17:52:49</sys_updated_on> <unloadable>false</unloadable> </sys_script_fix> </record_update>
